key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks, including FDIC fines and potential compliance weaknesses
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities, including data breach risks and reliance on third-party vendors
Customer complaints and inconsistent customer satisfaction
Economic and competitive pressures, including interest rate sensitivity and competition from fintech companies
controversies: FDIC fine for violating the Truth in Lending Act and Regulation Z
Data breach at Republic Bank of Chicago
Customer complaints filed with the Better Business Bureau
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction and mixed customer reviews
Impact of COVID-19 relief measures on customer relations
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance weaknesses highlighted by FDIC fine
Dependence on third-party vendors for core banking systems and cybersecurity
